long_description: Drop over the lip with the lightweight carbon Swix Medieval ski poles in your hands. They offer excellent weight savings over conventional poles and a comfortable grip for any type of skiing. Carbon shafts have a superb swing weight to aid in planting your poles exactly where you want them. Straps comfortably position your hands for optimal power transmission and control. Grips are designed to fit easily in your hands. Baskets work best for packed snow. Closeout.
short_description: Drop over the lip with the lightweight carbon Swix Medieval ski poles in your hands. They offer excellent weight savings over conventional poles and a comfortable grip for any type of skiing.
